title: Just had a twitch 1v5 penta kill
body:
ADC 2K18 LOOOL. CRIT ADC NEEDS BUFFS!!! THEIR TRASH TIER NOWWW

Like... I still find ADC super strong, maybe they dont click as early as before, but they are definetly still strong. Had this Twitch I believe 2 shot a kaisa. That is crazy. 

I hope crit adc will not get a massive buff for whatever reason.
